thread.title: Audi Runs Super Bowl Ad About The “Pay Gap”, There’s Just One BIG Problem…
thread.title_full: Audi Runs Super Bowl Ad About The “Pay Gap”, There’s Just One BIG Problem…

author: Nickarama
title: Audi Runs Super Bowl Ad About The “Pay Gap”, There’s Just One BIG Problem…
text:
11:57pm February 5,   were at least a couple of Super Bowl commercials this year that seemed to push a political agenda. 
First, there was the Budweiser ad which portrayed an unwelcoming attitude to immigrants by Americans . The ad also turned out to be mostly false depiction of the entry into the country of Adolphus Busch . 
But there was also this little gem from Audi pushing the false statistics of gender pay inequality. 
“Women are still paid 21% less than men,” Audi tweeted about their ad. “As a brand that believes in progress, we are committed to equal pay for equal work.” Progress is for everyone. At Audi, we are committed to equal pay for equal work. #DriveProgress pic.twitter.com/pF0t14ido8
